name: Torreto Pants Green
description:
Carrying Capacity: 0.5K µSCU
987 redefines classic slacks with the Torreto. These mid-rise, straight cut pants incorporate a section of fabric studding along the side seam to provide a pop of personality.
description_cn:
储物空间：0.5K μSCU
987用特雷托重新定义了经典长裤。这些中腰直衩的裤子在侧缝处加入了一段布料，彰显个性。
